/* Ordinary code color */

{

}

{

}

.com,
.highlight-comment,
.xaml__comment,
font[color="#008000"],
.gist .pl-c
{
	color: #5cbc5c !important
}

font[color="#a31515"],
.str
{
	color: #d69d85 !important;
}

[style*="Red"],
.highlight-literal,
.xaml__tag_start,

	color: #e44343 !important;
}

.highlight-number,
font[color="#2b91af"],

.typ
{
	color: #09f1eb !important;
}

.hljs
{
	color: hsl(200, 0%, 80%) !important;
}

.hljs-meta
{
	color: hsl(100, 50%, 50%) !important;
}

.hljs-attribute,
.hljs-attr,
.xaml__attr_value,
.atv
{
	color: hsl(50, 80%, 50%) !important;
}

.hljs-literal,
.tag,
.gist .pl-s,
.gist .pl-pds,
.gist .pl-s .pl-pse .pl-s1,
.gist .pl-sr,
.gist .pl-sr .pl-cce,
.gist .pl-sr .pl-sre,
.gist .pl-sr .pl-sra
{
	color: hsl(180, 80%, 50%) !important;
}

.hljs-built_in,
.gist .pl-smi,
.gist .pl-s .pl-s1,
.gist .pl-c1,
.gist .pl-s .pl-v
{
	color: hsl(200, 100%, 50%) !important;
}

.hljs-number,
.atn,
.gist .pl-e,
.gist .pl-en,
.css__element
{
	color: hsl(280, 100%, 63%) !important
}
